title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 20.26 - Exceptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 20.26 - Exceptions

State Regulations

The commissioner may permit deviations from the
provisions of this Part where he is satisfied that the specific circumstances
involved in any transaction would result in a subversion of the intent of
article 46 of the Vehicle and Traffic Law if this Part were to be strictly
applied. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
20.26

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
